QuestData.Title: An Explosive Exit
QuestData.Description:
Alright, $p. I think it's time we make a run for it.
Hopefully my wagon's still nearby.
I'll steer us to our hideaway. I just need you to lob explosives onto any sethrak who are brave enough to follow us.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Nisha's wagon and ride it to safety.
